title: Script from UFO - Japanese?
content:
Hey everyone, at the risk of ridicule and being thought a madman, I was trolling a UFO site and came across some documents. These represent script from a supposed extra-terrestrial craft the government is in possession of. I have seen the main "alien" type someplace, but it has been more than a few years ago. It looks like a faux kanji or some other fake script.

[http://isaaccaret.fortunecity.com/pacl-lang-analysis-p119-fullsize.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417103258/http:/isaaccaret.fortunecity.com/pacl-lang-analysis-p119-fullsize.jpg "http://isaaccaret.fortunecity.com/pacl-lang-analysis-p119-fullsize.jpg")

This is one of the better pages, but there are several at:

[http://isaaccaret.fortunecity.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417103258/http:/isaaccaret.fortunecity.com/ "http://isaaccaret.fortunecity.com")

I am currently looking through my library and will update if I find it.

-Mike

UPDATE: It looks like flipped Katakana i.e. Matrix rain... there are a few pics online... I actually am going to link a new image.  
(rotated 180°)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417103258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Alienscript_5975.jpg)

and the matrix-esque sample:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417103258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MatrixCodeCloseUp_4308.jpg)

From the wikipedia... thanks.
author: lunyboy

comments.content: Hey, Mike, I think that instead of the typeface sample, the JPEG that got uploaded is the Fortune City logo.

The FortuneCity logo is what appears when you try to hotlink an image from them. If you go to the site and click on page 119 on the right hand side, you can see the image. You might have to reload it if you clicked on the hotlink already.

- Lex
Two, maybe three characters from the first sample _resemble_ mirrored Katakana.
I can see some flipped numbers in the faux-Matrix image -- 36. Then there are unflipped numerals, like 1 and 74...
